summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2016 for the improvement of Ray Street and West Ray Street from the east margin of Second Avenue North to west margin of First Avenue West, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading the same, and by providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 20421, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
